books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties that tells the story of Jay Gatsby's unrequited love for Daisy Buchanan.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality, seen through the eyes of young Scout Finch.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that also critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A novel about the experiences of a young man named Holden Caulfield, who is disillusioned with the adult world.

books.title: New Book
books.author: Swam Yi Phyo
